caseSubject: U/A 184/Enforcement of Fundamental Rights / Human Rights
caseTitle: Engineer Iqbal Zafar Jhagra v. Federation of Pakistan and others
tagline: The Chairman Oil & Gas Regulatory Authority (OGRA) is directed to fix the price of CNG after taking into consideration the statement in writing filed by the Government as well as this order and the matter is adjourned for further proceedings.
